alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 10 at 12:59PM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 342 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 21 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI LEAKE RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON SMITH IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CLARKE JASPER KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI JEFFERSON DAVIS LAWRENCE LINCOLN MARION IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI COVINGTON FORREST JONES LAMAR IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS FRANKLIN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BASSFIELD, BAY SPRINGS, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CARTHAGE, COLLINS, COLUMBIA, CONEHATTA, DE KALB, DECATUR, FERRIDAY, FOREST, HARRISONBURG, HATTIESBURG, HEIDELBERG, JONESVILLE, LAUREL, LUMBERTON, MAGEE, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MERIDIAN, MONTICELLO, MORTON, MOUNT OLIVE, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWTON, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PRENTISS, PURVIS, QUITMAN, RALEIGH, RICHLAND, ROXIE, SCOOBA, SHUBUTA, STONEWALL, TAYLORSVILLE, UNION, VIDALIA, WEST FERRIDAY, AND WEST HATTIESBURG.
